casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Somchoi NOORSOB 131P16-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 17, 2016 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Somchoi Noonsab, for Noonsab, Somchoi. Somchoi Noorsob, for Noorsob, Somchoi.

*252The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of October 2016 by Petitioner for Notice to Appeal and Request for a Certificate of Appealability:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of October 2016."
